Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Manages the game's state and calls functions on the board and its members based on this

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(int squareWidth, int width, int height, int startPointX, int startPointY)
      constructor for game manager
      Parameters:
      squareWidth - takes the square width
      width - takes the window's entire width
      height - takes the window's entire height
      startPointX - takes the startpointX to start drawing rectangles from
      startPointY - takes the startpointY to start drawing rectangles from

  • Method Details

    • withinBounds

      public boolean withinBounds(double testX, double testY, int lowerBoundX, int lowerBoundY, int upperBoundX, int upperBoundY)
      takes an X and Y to test, and identifies if it is within the 4 bounds also passed to it
      Parameters:
      testX - x to test
      testY - y to test
      lowerBoundX - lower x bound to compare with
      lowerBoundY - lower y bound to compare with
      upperBoundX - upper x bound to compare with
      upperBoundY - upper y bound to compare with
      Returns:
      true or false

    • click

      public void click(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      click, called originally by gamearena, passed to inputmanager and then to gamemanager if within bounds of the board, identify what square has been clicked on?
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the mouse's x
      mouseY - the mouse's y
